text:
TINYhr - Seattle Wa - full time We're looking for a talented full stack Ruby on Rails developer to join our small team. Our mission is to make employees and clients happier. We spend over 50% of our waking hours at work, so why not be happier and help make others happier?

We were called "revolutionary" in this Fast Company piece: http://bit.ly/GIHiIb

https://www.tinypulse.com/jobs
